text: The Pereschiv is a right tributary of the river Bârlad in Romania. It discharges into the Bârlad in Ghidigeni. Its length is and its basin size is . Its source is near the village Șendrești. Lake Pereschiv is located on this river. ==References== Category:Rivers of Romania Category:Rivers of Bacău County Category:Rivers of Vrancea County Category:Rivers of Galați County
title: Pereschiv
